mapper.select: SELECT F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_X, F.FRN_Y, F.FRN_START_TIME, F.FRN_END_TIME, F.FRN_TEL, F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_STREET, F.FRN_DETAIL, MAX(S.SAL_PRICE) AS SAL_PRICE, MAX(S2.STOCK_CT_NAME) AS STOCK_CT_NAME, MAX(S1.STOCK_NO) AS STOCK_NO, MAX(S1.STOCK_NAME) AS STOCK_NAME, MAX(I.IS_COUNT) AS IS_COUNT FROM FRANCHISE_T F LEFT OUTER JOIN SALES_T S ON F.FRN_NO = S.FRN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN INVENTORY_STAT_T I ON F.FRN_NO = I.FRN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK_T S1 ON I.STOCK_NO = S1.STOCK_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK_CATEGORY_T S2 ON S1.STOCK_CT_NO = S2.STOCK_CT_NO GROUP BY F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_X, F.FRN_Y, F.FRN_START_TIME, F.FRN_END_TIME, F.FRN_TEL, F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_STREET, F.FRN_DETAIL
